name: Active Volcano
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target blue permanent.
• Return target Island to its owner's hand.

name: Aisling Leprechaun
oracle_text: Whenever Aisling Leprechaun blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature becomes green. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Alabaster Potion
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains X life.
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity." —D'Avenant proverb

name: Amrou Kithkin
oracle_text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor_text: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

name: Anti-Magic Aura
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

name: Avoid Fate
oracle_text: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

name: Barbary Apes
flavor_text: Unpredictable in the extreme, these carnivorous apes will prey even upon their own kind.

name: Blazing Effigy
oracle_text: When Blazing Effigy dies, it deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the amount of damage dealt to Blazing Effigy this turn by other sources named Blazing Effigy.

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"O! call back yesterday, bid time return."
—William Shakespeare, *King Richard the Second*

name: Cat Warriors
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

name: Chain Lightning
oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus
oracle_text:
If Clergy of the Holy Nimbus would be destroyed, regenerate it.
{1}: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus can't be regenerated this turn. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

name: Crimson Kobolds
flavor_text: "Kobolds are harmless." —Bearand the Bold, epitaph

name: Crookshank Kobolds
flavor_text: The Crookshank military boasts a standing army of nearly twenty-four million, give or take twenty-two million.

name: Cyclopean Mummy
oracle_text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.
flavor_text: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

name: Darkness
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride,/ And hug it in my arms." —William Shakespeare, *Measure for Measure*

name: D'Avenant Archer
oracle_text: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Devouring Deep
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "Full fathom five thy father lies;/ Of his bones are coral made;/ Those are pearls that were his eyes;/ Nothing of him that doth fade,/ But doth suffer a sea-change/ Into something rich and strange." —William Shakespeare, *The Tempest*

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its mana value.
flavor_text: D'Haren stared at the twisted lump of metal that had been a prized artifact. The fight was getting ugly.

name: Durkwood Boars
flavor_text: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . ." —Mark 5:13

name: Emerald Dragonfly
oracle_text:
Flying
{G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Flittering, wheeling, / darting in to strike, and then / gone just as you blink." —"Dragonfly Haiku," poet unknown

name: Enchanted Being
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Enchanted Being by enchanted creatures.

name: Enchantment Alteration
oracle_text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

name: Energy Tap
oracle_text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's mana value.

name: Equinox
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell if it would destroy a land you control."

name: Feint
oracle_text: Tap all creatures blocking target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by that creature and each creature blocking it.

name: Fire Sprites
oracle_text:
Flying
{G}, {T}: Add {R}.

name: Flash Counter
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text:
"She grinned at me—a wicked grin. 'I hope you weren't relying too heavily on that, my dear.'"
—Medryn Silverwand, *Diary*

name: Flash Flood
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target red permanent.
• Return target Mountain to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

name: Force Spike
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
". . . [A]nd gives to airy nothing/ A local habitation and a name."
—William Shakespeare, *A Midsummer-Night's Dream*

name: Ghosts of the Damned
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The voices of the dead ring in the heart long after they have faded from the ears.

name: Giant Slug
oracle_text: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

name: Giant Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: "O! it is excellent/ To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous/ To use it like a giant." —William Shakespeare, *Measure for Measure*

name: Giant Turtle
oracle_text: Giant Turtle can't attack if it attacked during your last turn.
flavor_text:
"The turtle lives 'twixt plated decks/ Which practically conceal its sex./ I think it clever of the turtle/ In such a fix to be so fertile."
—Ogden Nash, "The Turtle"

name: Glyph of Delusion
oracle_text: Put X glyph counters on target creature that target Wall blocked this turn, where X is the power of that blocked creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a glyph counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a glyph counter from this creature."

name: Glyph of Destruction
oracle_text: Target blocking Wall you control gets +10/+0 until end of combat. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Glyph of Doom
oracle_text: Choose target Wall creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that were blocked by that creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"He knows he has a short span of life, that the day will come when he must pass through the wall of oblivion . . ."
—William Faulkner

name: Glyph of Life
oracle_text: Choose target Wall creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage by an attacking creature this turn, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: Any wall can be battered down, but at what cost?

name: Glyph of Reincarnation
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only after combat.
Destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn. They can't be regenerated. For each creature that died this way, put a creature card from the graveyard of the player who controlled that creature the last time it became blocked by that Wall onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Headless Horseman
flavor_text:
". . . [T]he ghost rides forth to the scene of battle in nightly quest of his head . . . he sometimes passes along the Hollow, like a midnight blast . . ."
—Washington Irving, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow

name: Hell Swarm
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The brightness of day turned in an instant to dusk as the swarm descended upon the battlefield.

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"The day of spirits; my soul's calm retreat/ Which none disturb!"
—Henry Vaughan, "Silex Scintillans"

name: Hornet Cobra
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text:
"Then inch by inch out of the grass rose up the head and spread hood of Nag, the big black cobra, and he was five feet long from tongue to tail."
—Rudyard Kipling, *The Jungle Books*

name: Immolation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

name: Indestructible Aura
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Theodar strode the battle lines, snatching swords with his bare hands and casting them aside until all cowered before him.

name: Keepers of the Faith
flavor_text: And then the Archangel Anthius spoke to them, saying, "Fear shall be vanquished by the Sword of Faith."

name: Kobolds of Kher Keep
flavor_text: Kher Keep is unique among fortresses: impervious to aerial assault but defenseless from the ground.

name: Lost Soul
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: She walks in the twilight, her steps make no sound,/ Her feet leave no tracks on the dew-covered ground./ Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—/ But those who go with her are never the same.

name: Moss Monster
flavor_text: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

name: Osai Vultures
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures.
Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A sign of battle, the Vultures circle and wait for the victorious to depart.

name: Pit Scorpion
oracle_text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavor_text: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

name: Psychic Purge
oracle_text:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.

name: Pyrotechnics
oracle_text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me!/ Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return." —Navajo war chant

name: Raging Bull
flavor_text:
"Sometimes the bulls win, and sometimes the bears win. But the bulls have more fun."
—Anonymous

name: Remove Enchantments
oracle_text: Return to your hand all enchantments you both own and control, all Auras you own attached to permanents you control, and all Auras you own attached to attacking creatures your opponents control. Then destroy all other enchantments you control, all other Auras attached to permanents you control, and all other Auras attached to attacking creatures your opponents control.

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

name: Rust
oracle_text: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor_text:
"How dull it is to pause, to make an end,/ To rust unburnished, not to shine in use,/ As though to breathe were life!"
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Ulysses"

name: Shelkin Brownie
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn.
flavor_text: Leave a bowl of milk on your doorstep each night for the brownies, or they'll cause you no end of mischief.

name: Spirit Shackle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

name: Subdue
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its mana value.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text:
"Her lips suck forth; see, where it flies!"
—Christopher Marlowe, *The Tragical History of Doctor Faustus*

name: The Brute
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text: "Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed." —Samuel Butler

name: Transmutation
oracle_text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me!" —Randall

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

name: Vampire Bats
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text: "For something is amiss or out of place/ When mice with wings can wear a human face." —Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

name: Venarian Gold
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Venarian Gold enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put X sleep counters on it.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it has a sleep counter on it.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, remove a sleep counter from that creature.

name: Walking Dead
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Walking Dead.
flavor_text: The Walking Dead are the remains of freakish experiments by the Necromantic Lords.

name: Wall of Caltrops
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Caltrops blocks a creature, if at least one other Wall creature is blocking that creature and no non-Wall creatures are blocking that creature, Wall of Caltrops gains banding until end of turn. (If any creatures with banding you control are blocking a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by.)
flavor_text: "Ow! Ow ow ow! Oooh, ow, OW!"

name: Wall of Earth
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The ground shuddered violently and the earth seemed to come to life. The elemental force contained in the vast wall of earth was trapped, bent to its controller's will.

name: Wall of Heat
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . .

name: Wall of Shadows
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Shadows by creatures it's blocking.
Wall of Shadows can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.

name: Wall of Vapor
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Vapor by creatures it's blocking.
flavor_text:
"Walls of a castle are made out of stone,/ Walls of a house out of bricks or of wood./ My walls are made out of magic alone,/ Stronger than any that ever have stood."
—Chrysoberyl Earthsdaughter, *Incantations*

name: Wolverine Pack
oracle_text: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: "Give them great meals of beef and iron and steel, they will eat like wolves and fight like devils." —William Shakespeare, *King Henry V*

name: Zephyr Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
